title: FS: 2021 Historic Autograph Triple Folder T206 4 Minor Leaguers SOLD

posts.post_title: FS: 2021 Historic Autograph Triple Folder T206 4 Minor Leaguers SOLD
posts.post_content:
I listed this here because the card has 4 authentic T206 minor league cards. The actual triple folder has a slight nick on the back where the triple folder closes. The price is SOLD delivered through PayPal friends/family please. The card will ship in it's original felt bag and box too. Thanks for looking.

Joe K

One last bump for lower price. :)
